item.title: Multiple potholes, broken patch tarmac and uneven surfaces, especially along nearside edge - very dangerous for cyclists, 29th June
item.description:
Right along stretch of Orchard Way between Brooklyn Road and P.E. Way - every 3m there's a rut across the road, with holes that are getting bigger and deeper; nearly all drain covers have broken tarmac around them; entrance to Pennsylvania Ave is particularly bad with multiple tarmac patches breaking up; some of the speed bumps are completely broken surface. I've attached only 3 photos of over 40 I took this evening.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Orchard Way, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
